Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing Thorndale Station
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Thorndale .

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Thorndale .

  • For 95th-bound service from Thorndale, take a Howard-bound train to Granville and transfer to a 95th-bound Red Line train.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
